channel.title: Incline Village Real Estate News - Updated Monthly
channel.description: Updated Incline Village Sales Statistics to include: details on Residential and Condominium sales, Year to Date, by Quarter and Subdivision - Updated Monthly.

item.title: 3rd Quarter of 2007, Incline Village NV Residential Homes Market
item.description: 3rd quarter of 2007 Incline Village, NV residential homes market summary for all subdivisions and areas including: Crystal Bay Lakefront and Mill Creek real estate.

item.title: 3rd Quarter of 2007, Incline Village NV Residential Condo Market
item.description: 3rd quarter of 2007 Incline Village, NV residential condo market summary for all subdivisions and areas including: The Woods and Central Incline Village condominiums.

item.title: 3rd Quarter of 2007, Incline Village NV Residential PUD Market
item.description: 3rd quarter of 2007 Incline Village, NV residential pud market summary for all subdivisions and areas including: The Championship and Incline Village Golf Course homes.

item.title: Residential Home Sales Incline Village, NV, 2005
item.description: Residential Home Sales market summary for all subdivision and areas of Incline Village in 2005. Incline residential property statistics include: number of properties for sale and average listing price.

item.title: Condo Sales Incline Village, NV, 2005
item.description: Residential condo Sales market summary for all subdivision and areas of Incline Village in 2005. Incline condo property statistics include: number of properties for sale and average listing price.

item.title: PUD Sales for Incline Village, NV, 2005
item.description: PUD Sales market summary for all subdivision and areas of Incline Village in 2005. Incline residential pud property statistics include: number of properties for sale and average listing price.

item.description: 2nd Quarter 2007 Incline Village Residential Condos market summary for all subdivision and areas including: Jennifer, Upper and Lower Tyner and Ponderosa.

item.title: Incline Village Residential PUD Market - 2nd Quarter 2007
item.description: 2nd Quarter 2007 Incline Village Residential PUD market summary for all subdivision and areas including: Apollo, Mountain and Championship Golf Course.
